subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Williams, who missed many of the Broncos’ off-season workouts with sore hamstrings, tore his left Achilles’ tendon during a punt return drill at training camp and will miss the season.
snippet: Williams, who missed many of the Broncos’ off-season workouts with sore hamstrings, tore his left Achilles’ tendon during a punt return drill at training camp and will miss the season.
